settings.title: Talk about your business
settings.text:
Ikaria Wellness Pvt Ltd, 412-B, The Capital, Bandra Kurla Complex, Mumbai 400 051, Maharashtra

hello@nyumi.com I + 91 800 900 7006

settings.title: born from science
settings.description: All that we make is rooted in science. Our panel of German and Indian health experts have developed a unique formulation with clinically researched ingredients, perfectly proportioned to balance the nutritional requirements in the body.

settings.title: power of two
settings.description: When it comes to your nutrition, you shouldn‚Äôt have to choose just one. Our holistic nutrition combines the age-old science of Indian herbs like haldi, amla, tulsi, with advanced western nutrients like biotin and hyaluronic acid.

settings.title: no fine print
settings.description: We fought harder to keep the bad out. Our gummies are created to eliminate bad additives, preservatives and ingredients that don‚Äôt meet our high standards of good nutrition.

settings.title: be new. be you.
settings.description: With each day comes the need to balance the outside world of duties and inner world of ambitions. In all of this, how often has wellbeing become an afterthought? At Nyumi, our purpose is to make good health a daily companion in your journey towards personal progress.

settings.title: urban indian women are nutrient deficient
settings.description: A woman‚Äôs biological buildup is unique, and so are her nutritional needs. She plays a reproductive role, and also multitasks at every stage of life. In all of this, good health takes a backseat. Regular signs of deficiency, like acne, hair fall, tiredness, or food cravings, are rarely treated at the root. We found our answer in creating daily nutrition that works alongside women, meeting their dietary and lifestyle needs.

settings.block_desc: A biotin-based hair supplement gave me great results, until a routine blood test reported a spike in my thyroid level. I found out that too much biotin could interfere with test results and lead to misdiagnosis. For Nyumi, our formulation panel ensured precise dosages as established by WHO and ICMR (Indian Council of Medical Research), to create nutrition that‚Äôs safe and effective.

settings.block_title: choosing indian herbs over western ingredients. or vice versa.
settings.block_desc: There are merits to both. Our ancient remedies have been used effectively for centuries, while many western ingredients have proven efficacy with rich scientific evidence. Having grown up experiencing both worlds, I wanted Nyumi to be powered by a blend of these two. The result is holistic nutrition with combined efficacy.

Kadhas taste bad. No one enjoys swallowing a pill. Half our cabinets are filled with bottles of vitamins that we intend to eat, but avoid or forget about. Our gummies pack in the nutrients you need in bite size treats that makes you look forward to eating your vitamins everyday, so building good habits comes easy.

settings.founders_des: I grew up drinking neem kadhas and wheat germ juices reluctantly, often pouring it into my brother‚Äôs glass when no one was looking. At boarding school, each Wednesday was a struggle, as we were handed our weekly pink vitamin tablet. I‚Äôd place it at the back of my throat and gulp a glass full of water, only to find the pill still in my mouth. As a teen, the strong smell of my Omega 3 capsule made me nauseous before I could even swallow it. I knew there had to be a better way.
settings.founders_bot_desc: and that‚Äôs why I built Nyumi.

settings.banner_desc:
backed by science.
packed as gummies.
packed as gummies.
packed as gummies.
packed as gummies.
packed as gummies.

settings.title: about ananya
settings.description: A graduate from Harvard Business School and Olin College of Engineering, Ananya is passionate about the intersection of technology, wellness and design. She has worked at Microsoft, and Headspace - a leading mental wellness app. Her design thinking skills, background in technology, and interdisciplinary experience enables her to work with experts across disciplines and build Nyumi into the brand it is today.

settings.title: Work with Us
settings.description: Nyumi was established to enable each one‚Äôs personal journey of growth and progress by ensuring good nutrition isn‚Äôt compromised. We‚Äôre a close-knit collaborative team that believes in brainstorms, getting things rolling, and giving it all we‚Äôve got. Our growing work family is always happy to welcome the right talent aboard.

settings.value_desc: There are no unimportant jobs. Every task, small or big, needs our accountability and grit.
It keeps us rooted and focused on the future. We respect achievements, and celebrate working towards higher goals.
We keep our minds curious and eyes open. It helps us see possibilities and use them to drive change.
Change takes patience and smart work. We bring passion, mindfulness and honest effort towards making a positive change in people's lives.
A lot is achievable with less, when we are creative. We're scrappy, hands-on, and up for a challenge. Bring it on.

settings.core_des: As a company that works to bridge the gap between good nutrition and wellbeing, we take our work seriously. Our actions and decisions are guided by our core values every day.

settings.job_desc:
Ikaria is building a world-class brand and is looking for a creative and strategic Head of Marketing to create, define and implement an online marketing and growth strategy for Nyumi. This role will work directly with the CEO/Founder and take full ownership of all online presence, customer acquisition and retention programs. This is a unique opportunity to be part of an early stage startup to build and execute strategy from a fresh slate.

Key Responsibilities:

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Lead marketing, strategy, messaging, content, PR and social media ‚Äì internally, and fostering relationships with external partners

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Own and lead customer acquisition and retention strategy across all channels

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Track and organize a robust system for data-analytics and KPIs

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Brand Building through meaningful storytelling, groundbreaking campaigns, and effective marketing

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Create and own the GTM strategy for new products and features

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Become an expert on our customers, and drive the customer voice across the company

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Be a steward of the Brand internally and externally

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Create and execute affiliate, content and influencer strategies with a focus on developing, contributing to, and sustaining a movement focused on our brand‚Äôs mission.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†Manage all agency relationships



Who you are:

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† 5+ years of experience in brand marketing (preferably working in-house at a brand)

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† 2+ years of experience in running digital acquisition campaigns across various platforms, including Google, Facebook, Instagram, Amazon marketing.

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Proficient with email marketing platforms, managing paid media campaigns

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Highly analytical and data-driven mindset

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Passionate about building and growing brands

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Comfortable owning and being held accounting for business outcomes

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Excellent verbal and written communication skills

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Comfortable with ambiguity

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Ability to think big picture while being focused on the details

¬∑¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬† Self starting, entrepreneurial mindset and strong work ethic

We‚Äôre a small team so this is not a managerial position from Day 1. You won‚Äôt just be strategizing from high; a large part of the role, especially in the early days, will involve getting your hands dirty and executing on the plans as well.¬†

If you are equally excited about strategizing as rolling up your sleeves to get work done, you should apply. This is a unique opportunity to build a brand from launch.

The individual in this role will be responsible for developing brand strategies, marketing plans to drive product and community growth ensuring brand consistency & voice. You will be challenged to act both creatively and analytically to make Nyumi a household name. If you're driven and believe in the magic of good story telling, this role is for you. If you like doing this inside a start up with a digital-first approach, then this is really the role for you!

Roles and Responsibilities:


‚Ä¢ Strategize, plan & execute the projects required to boost our brand presence (online/offline).
‚Ä¢ Action and analyse consumer insights & take up initiatives to position our brand.
‚Ä¢ Lead creative development to motivate the target audience to take action.
‚Ä¢ Measure and report performance of all marketing campaigns, and assess ROI and KPIs.
‚Ä¢ Ensure adherence to brand guidelines and maintain consistency across all internal and external communications.
‚Ä¢ Monitor market trends, research consumer markets and competitor activities to identify opportunities and key. You would be working closely with multiple stakeholders including design, product marketing, business development, social media, performance marketing etc. Your additional job would be to keep all the work organised and ensure fast delivery of all marketing content.

Ideal Candidate:


‚Ä¢ Excellent written and verbal communication skills, a high level of organization, and impeccable attention to detail.
Ability to handle aggressive deadlines and prioritize work in a fast-paced work environment
‚Ä¢ A highly analytical self-starter who can manage multiple projects and figure out complex problems without a lot of oversight.
‚Ä¢ Demonstrated ability to create engaging content, come up with creative ideas, and think outside the box.
‚Ä¢ Positive attitude, reliable, transparent and enjoys working with different types of people.
‚Ä¢ 5+ years of experience across branding and communications.
Graduate/ Master‚Äôs Degree in marketing/ communications

Role: Social Media & Content Marketing Manager



Social Media Strategist using social media & content for brand awareness and impressions. Preferably worked in digital first brands



Key Responsibilities:



‚Ä¢ Develop, implement, and manage our social media strategy¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†
‚Ä¢ Complete Content Management - Development, execution & delivery of digital and print content across all our channels¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†
‚Ä¢ Plans and execute a content strategy that is not only engaging but also in line with the brand‚Äôs image and objectives
‚Ä¢ Measure the success of every social media campaign, apply data analytics to personalize & optimize content
‚Ä¢ Should have a knack for short copy, engaging & viral content, and the vision to translate that in design
‚Ä¢ Stay up to date with latest social media best practices and technologies
‚Ä¢ Promote Posts & use social media marketing tools such as Buffer
‚Ä¢ Compile data across social media platforms and create weekly/monthly reports, including analysis for insights, optimizations, and future strategy development
‚Ä¢ Competition Research & Mapping




Who you are:



‚Ä¢¬†Excellent knowledge of Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Twitter and other social media best practices
‚Ä¢ Experience with doing audience and buyer persona research
‚Ä¢ Good understanding of social media KPIs
‚Ä¢ Excellent multitasking skills
‚Ä¢ Critical thinker and problem-solving skills
‚Ä¢ Good time-management skills
‚Ä¢ Great interpersonal, presentation and communication skills


Experience:

3-5 Years, someone who has handled end-to-end social media for a digital / content brand. Preferably in FMCG / Health & Nutrition brands like Nykaa, MamaEarth, Sugar, Mcaffeine, Plum Goodness, The Man Company, iDiva, Popxo, Scoopwhoop, Dot & Key, The Face Shop India, DUNZO, THE WHOLE TRUTH Can be from Digital Marketing agencies as well, but should have worked extensively on Social Media Strategy & Content writing & not just client servicing profiles

The Key Account Manager role is perfect for candidates looking to learn about sales and business development at an early stage startup. This role will be responsible for our sales strategy, including online and offline channels. Unique opportunity to build the strategy from a blank slate and execute to fruition. We are seeking individuals with strong business acumen and interpersonal skills. Ideal candidates are self-driven, passionate and committed to learning.

KEY RESPONSIBILITES

Identify and qualify new opportunities for partnerships
Diligently manage existing clients to build strong relationships
Develop sales strategy for offline and online growth
Execute sales strategy to meet targets
Prepare regular reports of progress and forecasts

WHO YOU ARE

Bachelors or Masters degree preferred
Experience with cold calling and closing deals
Data-driven and analytical
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Strong interpersonal skills
Comfortable with ambiguity
Enjoy taking initiative

If you are excited at the idea of seeing yourself in this role at Nyumi, please apply with your resume and cover letter.

Key Responsibilities:



‚Ä¢ Be the face of the key leader while communicating with major stakeholders and his other counterparts or repartees.
‚Ä¢ Shadowing the key leader in important meetings and calls.
‚Ä¢ Suggest new ideas and initiatives to the key leader for the betterment of the organization.
‚Ä¢ Head the strategic planning processes and ensure ideas between the CEO and other leaders are aligned.
‚Ä¢ Helping key leader to prioritize their tasks and appointments.
‚Ä¢ Helping the leader in preparing him for upcoming meetings and providing him with all the necessary information.
‚Ä¢ Represent key leader in meetings and calls if he/she couldn‚Äôt make it.
‚Ä¢ Directing members in CEO teams, such as executive assistants and senior project managers.
‚Ä¢ Helping in the creation of key performance indicators for various teams
‚Ä¢ Handling the budget cycle process and helping managers to prepare their budget
‚Ä¢ Writing first drafts of proposals, emails, letters, etc. on behalf of the key leader.
‚Ä¢ Taking care of internal and external communications, such as newsletters, speeches, reports, and presentations .
‚Ä¢ Managing company in its initiatives and broad programs.
‚Ä¢ Researching and defining new business opportunities
‚Ä¢ Working in sync with the Human Resources team to address potential staffing issues.

Roles and Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Extensive knowledge of Amazon marketplace and AMS, driving all paid and non-paid initiatives
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of other accounts- Nykaa, Flipkart etc
‚Ä¢ Thorough knowledge of driving performance marketing for the brand; Proactively performing regular optimization of accounts
‚Ä¢ Responsible for working on E-commerce marketplace advertising platforms, strategizing, and optimizing campaigns on daily basis
‚Ä¢ Provide complete and accurate data in the weekly and monthly meetings
‚Ä¢ Assist to plan, develop, and oversee the initiative of major accounts
‚Ä¢ Managing communications between key clients and internal teams
‚Ä¢ Negotiating contracts with the client and establishing a timeline of performance
‚Ä¢ Establishing and overseeing internal budgets with the company and external budgets with the client
‚Ä¢ Working with design, sales team, creative, advertising, logistics, managers, marketing, and team members from other departments dedicated to the same client account to ensure the highest quality of materials are being produced and all client needs are met
‚Ä¢ Planning and presenting reports on account progress, goals, and quarterly initiatives to share with team members
‚Ä¢ Expanding relationships and bringing in new clients

Job Requirements


‚Ä¢ 3-4 years of Experience of direct response & E-commerce experience in an integrated, multi-channel marketing environment
‚Ä¢ B. Tech/MBAs from reputed institutes.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:



‚Ä¢ Extensive knowledge of Amazon marketplace and AMS, driving all paid and non-paid initiatives
‚Ä¢ Good knowledge of other accounts- Nykaa, Flipkart etc
‚Ä¢ Thorough knowledge of driving performance marketing for the brand; Proactively performing regular optimization of accounts
‚Ä¢ Responsible for working on E-commerce marketplace advertising platforms, strategizing, and optimizing campaigns on daily basis
‚Ä¢ Provide complete and accurate data in the weekly and monthly meetings
‚Ä¢ Assist to plan, develop, and oversee the initiative of major accounts
‚Ä¢ Managing communications between key clients and internal teams
‚Ä¢ Negotiating contracts with the client and establishing a timeline of performance
‚Ä¢ Establishing and overseeing internal budgets with the company and external budgets with the client
‚Ä¢ Working with design, sales team, creative, advertising, logistics, managers, marketing, and team members from other departments dedicated to the same client account to ensure the highest quality of materials are being produced and all client needs are met
‚Ä¢ Planning and presenting reports on account progress, goals, and quarterly initiatives to share with team members
‚Ä¢ Expanding relationships and bringing in new clients


QUALIFICATION:



‚Ä¢ Extensive knowledge of Amazon marketplace and AMS, driving all paid and non-paid initiatives
‚Ä¢ 3-4 years of Experience of direct response & E-commerce experience in an integrated, multi-channel marketing environment
‚Ä¢ B. Tech/MBAs from reputed institutes.

Responsibilities

‚Ä¢ Provide weekly/monthly financial and management information reports, including budget vs actual, key ratios, trend analysis with recommendation.
‚Ä¢ Responsible for accounting and financial systems, Business Plan, 100% statutory compliances, and accurate bookkeeping, monitor the preparation and maintenance of ledgers.
‚Ä¢ Monitor compliance with statutory authorities for taxation. Liaise with external, internal, and statutory auditors to ensure timely and smooth closure of financials
‚Ä¢ Initiate and oversee the complete ERP implementation with SAP & OMS, etc based on the right solution for company level requirements
‚Ä¢ Ensure registrations and all regulatory and statutory compliances are in place. Ensure accurate statutory reporting to relevant authorities and related regulatory guidelines of corporate law, GST, TDS, Labour laws, etc. Ensure legal and licensing compliances with periodic scanning of business model
‚Ä¢ Should be well versed and comfortable in dealing with professional CA firms, law firms, CS firms.
‚Ä¢ A primary point of contact for banking relationships - Strike alliances with leading banking and financial institutions for Nodal account operations, marketplace operations, etc
‚Ä¢ Analytical and digital mindset with focus on automation & dashboard creation for Management accurate decision making.
Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Candidate should be a CA with minimum 5-7 years of experience
‚Ä¢ Experience working at company raise venture money.
‚Ä¢ Strong understanding of Ind AS and Consolidation procedures
‚Ä¢ Extensive understanding of financial trends both within the company and general market patterns
‚Ä¢ Proficient user of finance software
‚Ä¢ Strong interpersonal, communication and presentation skills
‚Ä¢ Able to manage, guide and lead employees to ensure appropriate financial processes are being used
‚Ä¢ A solid understanding of financial statistics and accounting principles.

Key Responsibilities:
‚Ä¢ Analyze marketing and sales data to develop insights and make recommendations on areas for optimization
‚Ä¢ Create and maintain metrics reports on marketing and sales activities, effectiveness, and business impact
‚Ä¢ Analyse marketing campaigns and share key learnings with the CMO and the marketing team
‚Ä¢ Analyse marketing metrics to identify cause and effect relationships
‚Ä¢ Manage the measurement and optimization of paid as well as organic campaigns across relevant platforms such as social media, influencer, google, facebook etc.
‚Ä¢ Establish and maintain scalable processes that ensure best practices in campaign management

Must Have Qualification:
‚Ä¢ 2+- 4 year of relevant experience
‚Ä¢ Strong analytical skills (including mastery of Microsoft Excel) and experience with reporting and data analysis

Preferred Qualification:
‚Ä¢ 2+ year of relevant experience working with an ecommerce/D2C company in a similar role
‚Ä¢ Experience managing multiple Google Analytics accounts and developing customized automated reporting

Skills Required:
‚Ä¢ Very strong analytical skills
‚Ä¢ High quantitative aptitude

settings.title: career opportunities
settings.description: Please send in your application for the position you are qualified for, and we‚Äôll be in touch with you.

settings.title: think outside the list
settings.description:
If you believe you can bring value to our team through a role that‚Äôs not yet on our list, let‚Äôs chat.

write in to¬†careers@nyumi.com

settings.title:
nutrition shouldn't be
a tough pill to swallow
settings.purpose_desc: Our gummies are created to be both effortless and delicious. Now get your daily dose of nutrients, anywhere, anytime.

settings.title: we're born out of science
settings.description: Our team of German and Indian health experts created a formulation that perfectly blends the benefits of western and Indian ingredients.

settings.press_desc: If you need to boost your immunity, Nyumi gummies are a great alternative to regular pills‚Äîthe citrus flavour will actually have you excited to take them.
Gummies for good health: The idea of using ancient Indian remedies with western ingredients backed by scientific evidence led to a holistic approach towards women‚Äôs health
Delicious gummies that improve sleep quality and promote healthy skin? We‚Äôre in for it! Plus points for skin-friendly ingredients like pomegranate extract and vitamin E.

settings.announcement_bar_text: Up to 40% OFF + 3% OFF on online payments üéâ

settings.title: science and us go way back
settings.description: For us, science isn‚Äôt a linear process. It‚Äôs a continuous journey. We tirelessly researched and revisited diets, deficiencies, and ingredient sources to mindfully create nutrition that works for you.

settings.title: power of two: Indian + western ingredients
settings.desc: You no longer have to choose between two sciences. Our gummies combine age-old science of Indian ingredients like haldi, amla, tulsi, with advanced western nutrients like biotin, zinc, and iron.

settings.title: clinically researched
settings.desc: We love science, especially if it‚Äôs evidence-based research papers on nutrients. Our choices are backed with credible clinical studies that investigate an ingredient‚Äôs nutritional benefits.

settings.title: better than single ingredient
settings.desc: We chose the tougher thing to do, only because it‚Äôs more rewarding for you. Our multi-nutrient gummies are created with a precise balance of vitamins, minerals, and botanicals that work well in their respective dosage. So they can cater to your overall nutritional needs, instead of delivering just one nutrient.

settings.title: sourced with care
settings.desc: The ingredient and its source play a vital role in creating effective and trustworthy nutrition. We handpick suppliers who extensively study their ingredients like we do. Our family of ingredients includes patented, clinically proven and natively grown nutrients.

settings.heading: ingredients have to earn their place
settings.main_desc: Every ingredient is checked not just for nutritional benefits, but also for quality of source, clinical reports, and compatibility with other ingredients.

settings.title: we practice portion control
settings.description: Nutrients work well only if they‚Äôre eaten in the right amount. We left no room for more or less.

settings.title: POWERFULLY CONCISE
settings.description: We don‚Äôt fancy a label full of ingredients that exist to earn popularity scores. We‚Äôd rather get points on keeping only those ingredients that will deliver results.

settings.title: SAFE DOSAGE
settings.description: Our gummies meet Indian Recommended Dietary Allowance (RDA) regulations. They are created thoughtfully to avoid megadoses of any nutrient. This means, no nasty surprises or spikes in your nutrient level readings.

settings.title: MAKING EACH DOSE COUNT
settings.description: Amount eaten does not equal amount absorbed. To ensure that you receive the most from each dose, we focus on bioavailability scores, extract ratios, and ingredient combinations that work well together. Our gummy format enables better absorption than pills or powders.

settings.block_desc:
developed in germany

Our development team from Germany is one of the world‚Äôs first to have created vitamins in gummy form. They hold over 40 years of experience in formulating precise and high quality health supplements.

Along with doctors, our team includes nutritionists, pharmacists and health experts. They bring on board their experience and knowledge on latest development in nutrition science, vitamin formulation, and compliance with nutrition regulations.

settings.title: heart behind the science
settings.description: Nyumi is conceptualized, created and powered by women who understand that a fine balance between responsibilities and ambitions needs overall wellness. Our job is to make the power of daily nutrition accessible, effective and trustworthy

settings.title: brand
settings.faq_ques: What is Nyumi?
settings.faq_ans: Nyumi is a wellness brand that offers_science-backed_delicious gummy vitamins. Our range covers essential nutrients for skin, hair, sleep, immunity and UTI.

settings.title: brand
settings.faq_ques: Why did you choose to make vitamins as gummies?
settings.faq_ans: There are two really good reasons for that. One ‚Äì gummies are proven to support better absorption of nutrients by the body, as against pills or powders. Two ‚Äì if you are one of the 45% of Indians who don‚Äôt prefer swallowing pills (much like our founder), or can‚Äôt keep up with making healthy smoothies every day, you don‚Äôt have to miss out on daily nutrition. These delicious gummies help you stay regular and get results.

settings.title: product
settings.faq_ques: Do Nyumi gummies contain preservatives / artificial sweeteners?
settings.faq_ans: No. Our gummies get their colour from natural plant extracts like carrot and sweet potato and flavour from natural fruit extracts like blackberry and strawberry.

settings.title: product
settings.faq_ques: What are Nyumi gummies made of?
settings.faq_ans: Each gummy contains a proprietary blend of Indian herbs and western ingredients that are formulated in the right dosage, and made delicious with natural fruit and plant extracts as flavours. Our ingredients are sourced from around the world.

settings.title: product
settings.faq_ques: When can I expect to see results?
settings.faq_ans: Nyumi gummies provide you with essential nutrients from Day 1. Visible results should follow with 3 months of regular use. Since nutrition works deeper than overnight miracles, we recommend patience and consistency.

settings.title: product
settings.faq_ques: What makes Nyumi products different?
settings.faq_ans: Nyumi makes daily nutrition easy, effective and safe. Our formulation, created by Indian and German health experts uses superior ingredients in precise dosage. We made science work hard to create a powerful blend of Indian and western ingredients for you. Our gummies are easy and tasty to eat. That means you‚Äôll be looking forward to eating them, and seeing results.

settings.title: product
settings.faq_ques: Where are Nyumi gummies manufactured?
settings.faq_ans: Our gummies are created at FDA Registered, ISO certified, GMP certified manufacturing unit that ensures precision, quality and hygiene.

settings.title: product
settings.faq_ques: Are Nyumi gummies Non-GMO / Gluten Free / Soy Free / Dairy Free / Allergen Free?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, absolutely. We have a list of what's in and what‚Äôs not,right here.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: If I miss a day of eating them, can I make up by eating more the next day?
settings.faq_ans: No. The recommended per day dosage is two gummies. Don‚Äôt worry if you miss a day. Just keep up with it the next day onwards.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: How do you recommend eating Nyumi gummies?
settings.faq_ans: Please eat two gummies together, daily. Just chew and swallow. Take them after a meal for better absorption. That doubles up as a great way to remember taking them daily.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: Can I eat these gummies every day?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, we highly recommend it. Our gummies are intended as a daily dose of essential nutrients for you.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: Are there any side effects?
settings.faq_ans: Nyumi gummies do not have side-effects since they contain superior ingredients backed by clinical research, in the precise dosage that your body needs.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: Can I give it to my kids?
settings.faq_ans: Our immunity gummies have been designed for kids as well. We recommend giving them a single gummy as their daily dosage.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: What‚Äôs the shelf life of these gummies?
settings.faq_ans: Our gummies are best eaten within 18 months from date of manufacture.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: Can I eat more than two gummies in a day?
settings.faq_ans: No. We do not recommend more than two gummies per day. They are formulated with the precise dosage your body can absorb daily.

settings.title: product usage
settings.faq_ques: Should I eat Nyumi gummies before a meal or after?
settings.faq_ans: While you can eat these gummies at any time convenient to you, we recommend eating them after a meal for the best absorption of nutrients. Please note, our Beauty Sleep gummies should be eaten before bedtime.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: Where do you ship?
settings.faq_ans: We ship across India.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: How long does it take to ship?
settings.faq_ans: We deliver your order within 2-5 working days after dispatch in metros. For remainder cities, we deliver within 2-7 business days after dispatch. Deliveries to remote locations may take longer.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: Will I be notified when my package is shipped?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, you will receive an email with tracking details.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: Can I order without creating an account here?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, you can, but it would be easier to create an account so your next order would be a breeze.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: Can I change the delivery date of my order?
settings.faq_ans: You can call us at 82911 55181 and we will assist you to change your delivery date.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: How much does shipping cost?
settings.faq_ans: Shipping is free of cost. If you want expedited shipping, we levy additional charge of Rs 150.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: Where is my order?
settings.faq_ans: You can follow the track shipping link in your confirmation email. Alternatively, you could mail us your order no. and registered email ID using which you placed your order or call us on 82911 55181. We will check and revert to you on your order status. Please note we are available Mon-Fri from 10am to 6pm (except on Public holidays).

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: What is your return policy?
settings.faq_ans: If you have received a damaged product, we will replace your product. Please email us if you have any queries.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: What are my payment options?
settings.faq_ans: You can pay online via credit card, debit card, wallets like Paytm, Amazon, Mobiquik, netbanking and you can also opt for COD with an additional charge.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: How do I know if my payment has gone through?
settings.faq_ans: Once your payment has gone through, you will receive an email confirmation from us. This will include your order number. If you do not receive an email, please check your junk/spam folder.

settings.title: purchase, shipping & returns
settings.faq_ques: Help, I am having issues in checking out.
settings.faq_ans: Please reach out to us on +91-82911 55181 and our team will help you sort the issue, timings Mon-Fri 10-6PM.

settings.title: research & testing
settings.faq_ques: Are Nyumi gummies tested? How?
settings.faq_ans: We have a minimum of¬†four rounds of testing required during the production process to ensure you are getting the best possible product delivered. 1) Raw materials testing, 2) In-process testing, 3) Finished product testing, 4) Stability testing. Our final products are tested by NABL accredited third-party labs.

settings.title: research & testing
settings.faq_ques: Are Nyumi gummies FSSAI approved?
settings.faq_ans: Yes Nyumi Gummies are FSSAI Approved, and not just that our gummies are being manufactured in USFDA Registered Plant that is also GMP & HACCP approved, following stringent quality controls at all levels.

settings.title: research & testing
settings.faq_ques: Are Nyumi gummies tested on animals?
settings.faq_ans: No we do not test our products on animals, we are a 100% cruelty free Vegan brand.

settings.title: referral program
settings.faq_ques: How can I refer your products and earn cash-back?
settings.faq_ans: Once you purchase your first product, you are eligible for our referral program. You can then sign in, and get a unique referral link to share this your friends. Your friends will receive 20% off their first order, and once their purchase is complete, you will receive a 20% off voucher.

settings.ingr_point: Biotin, Vitamin C, Vitamin B6, Vitamin B5, Vitamin B12
Tagara Root Extract, Chamomile Extract, L-theanine, Vitamin E
Vitamin B3, Folic Acid, Melatonin, Inositol, Hyaluronic Acid, Hibiscus extract & Zinc
Vitamin A, Vitamin D2, Selenium, Curcumin, Iodine, Choline & Amla Extract

settings.html_text: Vitamin A deserves our love for more reasons than one. It plays an important role in maintaining good skin health as well as promoting immune function. We‚Äôre made of cells and tissues, and Vitamin A works to keep surface tissues healthy by reducing pigmentation and assisting the natural production of collagen. It also helps in the creation of cells that form a part of immune responses against infectious diseases.
settings.find_here: Radiant Skin  Happy Hair  Core Immunity UT Care Beauty Sleep

settings.html_text: Vitamin D2 is a hardworking nutrient that plays several roles. It helps the body absorb and regulate essential minerals. It also supports cell division for repair of damaged cells, helps reduce cell inflammation, and contributes towards keeping the immune system healthy. What‚Äôs more, studies show that regular intake of Vitamin D helps improve the quality of sleep, too.
settings.find_here: Radiant Skin Core Immunity Beauty Sleep

settings.html_text: Say hello to the sunshine Vitamin that has earned a placed in spotlight for its versatility. From the Vitamin D family, this one is more readily absorbed and also helps increase overall Vitamin D levels in the body. It supports healthy skin, bones and immunity. Unlike commonly used animal sources like fish liver oil, we‚Äôve chosen VitashineTM which is sustainably sourced from lichen and hence vegan. With a growing number of Indians showing a deficiency of Vitamin D3, it‚Äôs even more essential to replenish our body with this important nutrient.

This one‚Äôs quite an all-rounder! Vitamin C helps to improve skin tone, delay ageing, boost immunity, and also works to keep infections at bay. Our body creates more free radicals when triggered by stress, poor diet and lifestyle choices. This results in cell damage and even chronic disorders over time. Vitamin C delivers antioxidants, which are key to fight off free radicals. When taken regularly, it helps skin stay healthy and improves immune function.
settings.find_here: Radiant Skin Happy Hair Core Immunity UT Care Beauty Sleep

settings.html_text: E is for essential? We may safely say so. Vitamin E is required by the body for an array of functions from keeping cells healthy and reducing inflammations to fighting free radicals and supporting the immune system. Vitamin E has always been famous for replenishing skin and hair cells. It does so by protecting cells from oxidative stress caused by free radicals. Its anti-inflammatory properties help repair cells and antioxidants help prevent hair loss due to cell damage.
settings.find_here: Radiant Skin Happy Hair Core Immunity Beauty Sleep

settings.html_text: This nutrient packs a punch in just a small dose. Zinc, known as a trace mineral required in small amount, is used by over 300 enzymes for important chemical processes in the body. It helps make hair more healthy and resilient, preventing hairloss or premature greying. It supports cell division that helps in repair of damaged cells, key to healthy skin. It also contributes to a healthier immune function. We‚Äôve used Zinc citrate since it can be efficiently absorbed and used by the body.
settings.find_here: Happy Hair Radiant Skin Core Immunity

settings.html_text: Selenium is a trace mineral, which means the body needs it in a small amount. But it‚Äôs an essential nutrient because of the important role it plays in fighting free radicals and protecting from damage. A lack of selenium could show up as premature greying of hair. Replenishing the body with it can go a long way in maintaining skin and hair health.

Long before golden milk and turmeric lattes made a global wave, ancient sciences in India were using turmeric as a medicinal ingredient since centuries. Curcumin is a bioactive component is found in this Indian super- ingredient hailed for its antioxidants, anti-microbial and anti-inflammatory properties. Regular intake is known to boost immunity, and help keep skin clear and glowing. For our formulation, we sourced Curcumin C3 Complex ¬Æ, which is a patented and clinically proven composition. It contains 95% curcuminoids and better absorption, for maximum benefits in every dose.

Here‚Äôs unlocking the secret to keeping your skin hydrated. Hyaluronic acid is a wonder ingredient that helps retain water in tissues, which is important for their suppleness and natural firmness. It is mainly found in the skin and can absorb water 1000 times its own weight, maintaining skin‚Äôs moisture and softness. Skin ageing is closely linked to lack of moisture, which leads to wrinkles and dullness. But not when you have Hyaluronic acid by your side daily. Stay nourished and glow on.

Also known as the Queen of Herbs, this is one of India‚Äôs most ancient and trusted medicinal ingredients, and has earned a place on the global health map. Tulsi contains antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties that help fight against infections. Its leaves are rich in essential vitamins and minerals that support T-helper cells found in the immune system. Regular intake of Tulsi is known to improve body‚Äôs responses to viral and bacterial infections and reduce inflammations.

Keep recurring urinary tract issues at bay? Yes, we Cran! Cranberries contain Proanthocyanidins (PACs) that work to create a lining, preventing bacteria from binding in the bladder walls or urinary tract. We chose the effective PacRan¬Æ - a 100% natural, patented cranberry extract that has established safety and efficacy across multiple studies. Regular consumption has been shown to help in reducing the recurrence of urinary tract infections, and maintain urinary tract health over time.

Ready for some flower power in your daily nutrition? We‚Äôre talking of the species of Hibiscus known as Rose Mallow. Although it is native to Asia, its use as an antimicrobial herb has spread across continents. It contains flavonoids, which are antioxidant agents that fight off toxins in the body on a daily basis. They help reduce the occurrence of infections and inflammations.

This water-soluble Vitamin is also known as pyridoxine. Its chief roles in body function include supporting cell growth, and helping in the production of melatonin and serotonin that are required for restful sleep. It also helps maintain normal synthesis of cysteine, an amino acid responsible for keeping hair healthy. Since the body cannot create B6 on its own, it is essential to include it through external sources like food or supplements.

Better known as Niacin, this water-soluble vitamin is a co-enzyme that is vital to several body functions. It helps in maintaining hair and skin health as well as supporting the production of sleep-hormone melatonin. Vitamin B3 also complements Biotin, another essential nutrient for healthy hair, so every dose works effectively towards nourished and healthy hair.

Hair loss or early greying very often isn‚Äôt an isolated issue; it‚Äôs a symptom of deficiencies. Vitamin B12 is an essential nutrient in maintaining hair health. It keeps hair follicles nourished by supplying them with red blood cells. Nourished hair follicles means reduced hair loss and delayed greying. A Vitamin B12 deficiency tends to be common since it isn‚Äôt produced by the body and has to be derived through dietary supplementation. We‚Äôve got you covered.

This multi-talented nutrient takes care of hair like no other. Folic acid or folate helps in creation and circulation of red blood cells, which are food for hair follicles. It converts energy from food, making it available for many processes including hair follicle stimulation. It also prevents premature greying and supports healthy cortisol levels important for hair growth cycle. Staying regular with folic acid over time can help unlock more benefits like improvement in hair volume and lustre.

A part of the Vitamin B family, biotin helps convert food into energy, which is key for nourishment. While it helps maintain the nervous and digestive systems, its most visible benefits include improved hair, nails and skin. That‚Äôs because it supports metabolism of protein-building amino acids (keratin) essential for hair and nail health. Regular intake of biotin can check hair fall, and help improve length and thickness of tresses, and keep nails from becoming brittle, chipping and cracking. We‚Äôve used 100% RDA-approved levels of biotin, to ensure each dose is both effective and safe.

Good nutrition is an interconnected network in the body, and iodine is a chief example of this. The thyroid gland is responsible for producing hormones that help the repair and growth of cells. This includes hair follicles, too. That‚Äôs why a deficiency in iodine shows up as hair loss, along with thyroid-related issues. Getting enough of iodine daily will keep thyroid hormones in check, and hair follicles in place.

Choline is an important nutrient found in the cell membrane and its role is to help cell division. Hair growth takes place in a cycle, and cell division is the phase where new cells are created, increasing the length of hair by pushing old cells forward. Choline is made by the liver, but only in small amounts, which is why dietary supplementation becomes essential to get enough of this helpful nutrient. When Choline teams up with Inositol, they turn into a power-packed duo that supports hair health.

Inositol is a part of the Vitamin B family and plays a vital role in many body functions. It helps regulate various hormones, which in turn can help keep hair thinning in check. It works well when partnered with Choline, another nutrient essential for hair health.

This sweet-tart fruit has been around in Indian medicinal sciences for centuries. It contains 600mg of Vitamin C in every 100gms, making it a rich source for Vitamin C. It contributes to collagen synthesis. Its antioxidant properties keep free radicals in check and help prevent premature greying.

Good sleep is preceded by a relaxed mind. L-theanine is an amino acid that does that effectively. Rather than creating drowsiness, it helps ease the mind in a state of calm, and is also shown to reduce stress when consumed in sufficient amounts.

To fall asleep, it‚Äôs important for your body to be in a relaxed state first. Melatonin is the hormone that does this for you. It sends signals to your brain to induce sleep when it‚Äôs dark, and to wake you up as sunlight makes an appearance. Several factors like stress, lifestyle choices, or excess caffeine in the system can affect the natural melatonin production. Intake of melatonin helps the body relax and prepare for sleep, and even improve sleep quality. It supports your body‚Äôs natural state of sleepiness at bedtime, for a good night‚Äôs rest and repair.

This flower has been a part of sleep-inducing natural remedies for ages. Sleep is a function of receptors in the brain that create sleepiness. Chamomile contains an antioxidant called apigenin that aids these sleep receptors by binding with them. It also has relaxation and anti-anxiety effects. A good day begins with sound sleep, and this ingredient supports that.

This herb that graces the Himalayas has been used in traditional Indian sciences for many centuries. Also known as Valerian extract, this ingredient aids sleep by relaxing the central nervous system. It is also known to balance the circadian rhythm that controls the sleep-wake cycle and helps reduce symptoms of anxiety.

The body does a lot of repair and regeneration when in sleep mode. One of them includes cellular regeneration. Pomegranate extract helps in stimulating skin cells (keratinocytes), helping in their renewal, and preventing premature wrinkles and sagging. It is also packed with antioxidants that help neutralise effects of free radicals, improving skin radiance. This ingredient is here to help begin each day with refreshed, radiant skin that says ‚ÄúWoke up like this.‚Äù
Gummies are no fun if they turn sticky, mushy or too hard. We add Olive oil to make sure your gummies stay the way they arrived.

settings.description: We‚Äôve only kept the ingredients that deserved to stay. They‚Äôve been checked not just for their clinically proven nutritional benefits, but also for the quality of their source, bioavailability, and compatibility with other ingredients. Perfecting this led us across the globe, and we‚Äôre excited for our diverse family of ingredients to be part of yours, soon.

settings.title: kept out for good
settings.description: Whitening agents with side-effects, high-sugar flavour / colour enhancers, bulking agents containing trans-fat - these ingredients do not belong in your food. certainly not in your daily vitamin. We devised our formulation to consciously avoid them, and worked with safer alternatives.
settings.sub_description: Every ingredient here has a backstory that speaks of clinical studies, thoughtful sourcing, unique formulation and stability tests. If you‚Äôre as nerdy as we are, do check out the science behind bringing these ingredients together.

settings.faq_title: Who can take Radiant Skin?
settings.faq_detail: Anyone above 18 years of age can safely eat Radiant Skin gummies. Our formulation brings you the right dose of essential nutrients, and keeps out bad preservatives and additives

settings.faq_title: Can I take both gummies at the same time?
settings.faq_detail: Yes, absolutely! In fact we recommend that you eat two gummies together since it'll help build consistency and you'll be less likely to forget a dose. You can also choose to eat them separately, the effectiveness of our gummies stay the same.

settings.faq_title: When is the best time to have it?
settings.faq_detail: While you can eat these gummies at any time convenient to you, we recommend eating them after a meal for the best absorption of nutrients. Please note, our Beauty Sleep gummies should be eaten before bedtime.

settings.faq_title: How long does it take to work?
settings.faq_detail: Nyumi gummies provide you with essential nutrients from Day 1. You should be able to feel the difference after a month of regular use. Best results should follow within 2-3 months of sticking with your daily dose. Since nutrition works deeper than overnight miracles, we recommend patience and consistency.

settings.faq_title: What results should I expect?
settings.faq_detail: With regular use of Radiant Skin gummies for 3 months, you can look forward to naturally glowing skin, improved firmness, reduced appearance of wrinkles, and soft and supple skin.

settings.faq_title: Is taking Radiant Skin Gummies Safe?
settings.faq_detail: Please rest assured that your daily gummy vitamins bring you good nutrition without any compromises. All our gummies are formulated by our team of Indian and German health experts, keeping in accordance with RDA (Recommended Dietary Allowances). Our ingredients are picked with care and reviewed against Indian and International safety database. That means, no risks, only good health.

settings.faq_title: Does it have any side effects?
settings.faq_detail: Radiant Skin gummies do not have side-effects since they contain superior ingredients backed by clinical research, in the precise dosage that your body needs.

settings.faq_title: Are Nyumi gummies vegetarian?
settings.faq_detail: We did better. We‚Äôre not just vegetarian, we‚Äôre 100% vegan.

settings.faq_title: Should I swallow it before chewing?
settings.faq_detail: We recommend you chew the gummies rather than swallow directly. Also, this way you don't miss out on the delicious flavour.

settings.faq_title: Can I take it with other supplements?
settings.faq_detail: Yes, our gummies can be taken along with other supplements.

settings.faq_title: Can Pregnant / Nursing mothers consume it?
settings.faq_detail: We recommend pregnant / nursing mothers consult a doctor before consuming gummies.

settings.faq_title: For how long should I continue to take this?
settings.faq_detail: These are designed to give you the nutrients you need on a daily basis. We suggest taking them for a minimum of 90-180 days, and then continuing to make them a part of your daily ritual.

settings.faq_title: Can men use it?
settings.faq_detail: Yes, men can also benefit from our gummies.

settings.faq_title: If I stop using it, will my skin become bad again?
settings.faq_detail: Skin only reflects the nutrition and care it receives. In case your diet is deficient in essential nutrients that skin needs, we recommend you add this to your daily routine.

settings.faq_title: Is it helpful for hair as well?
settings.faq_detail: Good nutrition can help in more ways than one, and you may experience some positive difference in your hair health too. But if you are looking to solve hair-specific concerns, do try our Happy Hair gummies. You can check out our combo packs for best all-round nutrition.

settings.block_desc: When it comes to your nutrition, you shouldn‚Äôt have to choose just one. Our holistic nutrition combines the age-old science of Indian herbs like haldi, amla, tulsi, with advanced western nutrients like biotin and hyaluronic acid.
We fought harder to keep the bad out. Our gummies are created to eliminate bad additives, preservatives and ingredients that don‚Äôt meet our high standards of good nutrition.

All that we make is rooted in science. Our panel of German and Indian health experts have developed a unique formulation with clinically researched ingredients, perfectly proportioned to balance the nutritional requirements in the body.

settings.faq_detail: We recommend you chew the gummies rather than swallow directly. Also, this way you don't miss out on the delicious flavour.

settings.faq_detail: Yes, our gummies can be taken along with other supplements.

settings.faq_ques: What vitamins and minerals are in Multivitamin Gummies?
settings.faq_ans:
Our Multivitamin Gummies contain a blend of essential vitamins and minerals for each of our products.

  • Biotin Hair Gummies: Our Biotin Hair Gummies contain biotin, folic acid, and vitamins A, C, and E, which support healthy hair growth and overall hair health.
  • Beauty Sleep Gummies: Our Beauty Sleep Gummies are infused with melatonin, chamomile, and lavender, providing a blend of relaxing ingredients to support restful sleep and rejuvenation.
  • Radiant Skin Gummies: Our Radiant Skin Gummies are packed with collagen, hyaluronic acid, and vitamins C and E, promoting skin hydration, elasticity, and a youthful glow.

settings.faq_ques: Are Multivitamin Gummies suitable for vegetarians and vegans?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, our Multivitamin Gummies are suitable for both vegetarians and vegans as they are free from any animal-derived ingredients.

settings.faq_ques: Can I take Multivitamin Gummies with other medications or supplements?
settings.faq_ans: It is recommended to consult with a healthcare professional before taking Multivitamin Gummies with other medications or supplements to ensure compatibility and avoid any potential interactions.

settings.faq_ques: How long does it take to see the effects of beauty gummies?
settings.faq_ans: The effects of beauty gummies may vary depending on individual factors. Consistent use is key, and you may start noticing results within a few weeks but it is recommended to take two gummies continuously for 90 days.

settings.faq_ques: Are women's multivitamin gummies suitable for women of all ages?
settings.faq_ans: Yes, women's multivitamin gummies are suitable for women of all ages, providing essential nutrients that support overall health and well-being.

settings.faq_ques: What are biotin gummies, and how do they benefit hair, skin, and nails?
settings.faq_ans: Biotin gummies are enriched with biotin, a B-vitamin that promotes healthy hair, skin, and nails. They nourish and strengthen these areas, aiding in hair growth, skin radiance, and nail health.

settings.faq_ques: Are there specific ingredients to look for in biotin gummies for better results?
settings.faq_ans: Look for biotin gummies with additional ingredients like collagen, vitamins C and E, and antioxidants for better results in enhancing hair, skin, and nail health. These ingredients work synergistically to promote optimal benefits.
